title: I Was so Happy....
detail_text: <:th_ch0201/>Hello, Maki-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Ayumu. What’s up?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Sorry for being so sudden. But you commented on my sweets-making stream yesterday, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Eh.... No, I don’t know what you’re talking about....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>They had your icon, though?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>T-, then yeah, that might have been me. But I don’t really remember.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>I see.... Even if you don’t, I’m still happy! You commented on it, after all, Maki-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Guh.... I remember it just fine, okay! Because it looked really delicious!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Ehehe. I brought the one I made then with me. I think it turned out quite tasty, so.... Would you eat it together with me?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Geeeeez! Ayumu, you’re way too kind for your own good, be more careful, okay! I’ll have it! Thank you!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
